sub_title: Sr Dutch and European Patent Attorney at AOMB Intellectual Property | IP Consultant | AIPEX Supervisory Board | Partner
summary:
As a patent attorney I manage patent portfolios and provide strategic IP advice for a number of large accounts. Additionally, and due to the experience I have built up working for large accounts, I also lead the Business Unit ‘Large Enterprises’, also known as "Corporate Clients" .  AOMB is organised into three business units, each tailored to the needs of  different business sectors.

Before I joined AOMB in 1994, I worked as a researcher at a large chemical company in the Botlek.

I have substantial experience of independently conducting hearings at both the Netherlands Intellectual Property Office (NL Octrooicentrum) and the European Patent Office (EPO). These proceedings include examination proceedings before the Examining Division, opposition proceedings before the Opposition Division and appeal proceedings before the Boards of Appeal (BoA). Oral Proceedings before the European Patent Office (EPO) in Munich (München, Germany) and The Hague (Den Haag, The Netherlands). Oral proceedings (A hearing) before NLOC, Octrooicentrum Nederland, NL IP Office.

I am also specialized in managing restoration cases, re-establishment of right, loss of rights, non-payment of renewal fees, restore lost patents, non compliance with time limits, all due care requirements, assement of all due care, all before Netherlands Intellectual Property Office (Octrooicentrum Nederland, aka Dutch Industrial Patent (IP) Office, and the European Patent Office (EPO) . Any request for re-establishment of rights shall be filed in writing within two months of the removal of the cause of non-compliance. 

AOMB is co-founder of the strategic international IP alliance AIPEX, wherein in addition to our Dutch firm, firms from Germany, the United Kingdom, France, Spain, Italy, Norway, Poland and Hungary participate. By collaborating as a team of 200 professionals, we combine national and local knowledge, experience and professional capacity, creating strong leverage in Europe for our clients from overseas and multinational companies. 

Arie Blokland is also a full member of the European Institute of IP professionals. See for more information https://patentepi.org/en/

Specialty’s:  Patents ✦ IP Consultancy ✦ Opposition Division ✦Boards of Appeal ✦ Chemistry ✦Process technology ✦Examining Division EPO ✦Restoration of rights ✦octrooi-advocaat ✦Restore or reinstate lost patents
reestablishment

Do you want to get to know AOMB or AIPEX better? Please consult www.aomb.nl  or make a call for having a nice cappuccino or latte, whatever you want!

projects.title: Restoration proceedings of "lost"patents
projects.description: It can happen that a party unintentionally fails to pay the renewal fee. The result is that the patent is no longer in force. However, you can file a request for restoration with the Patent Office. Such a request must be filed soon after the party involved became aware of the lapse. In addition, the request must provide a detailed picture of all the circumstances surrounding the lapse. We have filed dozens of those requests and we can show a good track record (EPO and NL Octrooicentrum). Let's have a short talk on this, you can mail us at ab@aomb.nl

contributors.headline: Sr Dutch and European Patent Attorney at AOMB Intellectual Property | IP Consultant | AIPEX Supervisory Board | Partner

authors.headline: Sr Dutch and European Patent Attorney at AOMB Intellectual Property | IP Consultant | AIPEX Supervisory Board | Partner

profile_positions.description:
Arie is active for about twenty years in the field of preparing and attending Oral Proceedings at the European Patent Office before Examining Division, Opposition Division and Boards of Appeal, as well Hearings before the Netherlands Industrial Property Office (NIPO), especially restoration cases (loss of rights, restore patents due to failure of payments of fees, translations) under the Dutch Patents Act, reestablishment of rights

Arie Blokland heeft een langdurige ervaring op het gebied van het voeren van mondelinge zittingen bij het Europees Octrooibureau (EPO), voor zowel de Examining Division (inhoudelijke toetsing aanvraag), Opposition Division (Oppositie afdeling) en Afdeling van Beroep (na een negatieve beslissing van Examining Division of Oppositie afdeling). Verder is Arie Blokland ervaren op het gebied van het opstellen en indienen van bezwaar- en beroepsschriften bij het Europees Octrooibureau en de (Nederlandse) Octrooiraad (Bureau voor de Industriele Eigendom, NL Octrooicentrum), het begeleiden van cliënten bij het vaststellen van hun octrooistrategie, jet in kaart brengen van de octrooipositie van derden en het het daaruit destilleren van een octrooibeleid.

Arie Blokland heeft de beschikking over een groot wereldwijd netwerk van persoonlijke contacten op het gebied van kennisbescherming. Een up-to-date advies voor iedere ondernemer (SME, maar ook grote ondernemingen) is het resultaat.

Arie is partner at AOMB since 2001.
